verses.roman:
sārvabhauma-saṅge mora mana nirmala ha-ila
'kṛṣṇa-bhakti-tattva kaha,' tāṅhāre puchila

synonyms: sārvabhauma-saṅge—in the company of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; mora—My; mana—mind; nirmala—clarified; ha-ila—became; kṛṣṇa-bhakti-tattva—the truths of transcendental loving service to Kṛṣṇa; kaha—please explain; tāṅhāre—to him; puchila—I inquired.
translation: "Due to the association of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya, My mind has been enlightened. Therefore I have asked Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya about the truths of transcendental loving service to Kṛṣṇa.
